about_the_game:
Lucky Shield - a medieval beat 'em up in which the player is a living shield that absorb magic orbs to power up its attacks and recapture the continent from invaders and traitors.

Choose your character from a diverse cast of insane human shields and fight in any mode. You can take your friends on an adventure around Vilencia in local or online co-op. Saving the continent from invaders. Or, you can fight each other in multiplayer, the choice is yours!

Magic is the key to beating the game. To use magic, you need to eat a magic sphere, which will be endowed with magical power. But each use of one type of magic increases the overdrive scale. If you fill it - the character will lose his mind and turn into a living elemental, which the player cannot control.

During their adventure, players will encounter and rescue the Vilecia princesses. Each of which enhances its magical element. Maintain a relationship with them, and then your magic will become even stronger!
